title: Why can i not hide people on mobile?
body:
The hell is with [ordering on the friends list?](http://imgur.com/a/MGiZp)

Why do you have all the people with 'mobile' on their name above the people who are actually logged into the client but are marked as away? You are making me scroll for ages before i can actually them, it'd be even worse if i didnt have groups and just 1 ginormous list of friends.

Furthermore why display people who are logged in on mobile at all? It's pointless.

When im looking for someone to invite i wanna see who's logged into the actual game. Sure it's nice that you can msg them on their phones but that's a secondary concern.
